name: Pati’s Quest Sweet Dreams
overview: 4 Different scenarios, new toys, sweets, caves and forests. 5 levels in each scenario. Updated sound and much smoother scrolling. Pati is a little girl and she loves Abentuer, fun and pre-alto-early lollipop. Today she had a long day, but now it's time to go to bed. Pati also went to sleep, but your adventure was not yet finished, on the contrary, it just started. Pati started dreaming. She dreamed of many things collecting ice cream and sweets in her room or looking for jewels in a cave. But in her last dream, Pati wanted to prove that she is a heroine and that she is strong and now the leader comes for the player.... In a forest you can find yourself as a player, equipped with lollipops and the urge to collect everything you can find. But that's not that easy, because evil Mönsters do not make your goal an easy thing. But if the first time they got some lollipops, they are quickly quiet. Published in Amiga Format Issue No: 116 which came out on September 29, 1998.
